metadata.title: CVE-2024-43861 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: usb: qmi_wwan: fix memory leak for not ip packetsFree the unused skb when not ip packets arrive.

criterions.comment: linux-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
